author: Veronica Wells
title: Ed Hartwell Wants Joint Custody Of His Daughter With Keshia Knight Pulliam
text:
I #LOVE mornings with my munchkin!! Kandidly Keshia is back!! Download today & hear the real about birthing babies & motherhood‚Ä¶ üòÇ#MommyAndEllaGrace #KandidlyKeshia 
A post shared by Keshia Knight Pulliam (@keshiaknightpulliam) on Feb 3, 2017 at 6:47am PST 

The saga of Ed Hartwell and Keshia Knight Pulliam continues. After a short-lived marriage a pregnancy, and Ed‚Äôs doubts about the baby‚Äôs paternity, they‚Äôve reached the next chapter.
The last time we wrote about Ed Hartwell, it was to say that while he acknowledged that Keshia Knight Pulliam‚Äôs baby was his own, he didn‚Äôt believe he should pay child support for their 2-month-old daughter Ella Grace.
And now, he and Keshia are back in the headlines because he‚Äôs requesting joint custody.
According to TMZ , Keshia doesn‚Äôt want Ed anywhere near their daughter because she believes Ed plotted against Keshia trying to trigger a miscarriage.
Ed denies the claims.
In his fight for custody, he submitted a letter from his ex-wife Lisa Wu speaking about his abilities as a father.
It read: ‚ÄúI am never worried about my child when he is with his dad, I know his dad will do everything within his power to love, protect and provide for EJ while he is not with me. I am positive that [Hartwell] will put his daughter‚Äôs best interest first as he has shown with my children.‚Äù
Now, Ed claims that he is willing to pay child support.
Do you think he and Keshia should share custody of their daughter?
Veronica Wells is the culture editor at MadameNoire.com. She is also the author of ‚ÄúBettah Days.‚Äù You can follow her on Facebook and Twitter @VDubShrug.
